channel.title: Help getting server online
channel.description:
Hey,
I need someone decent who really can help me with getting my server online. Probably only way to do this is via Teamview. No errors, nothing, just game wont start. Messed with it 2 years ago, couldn't figure it out, I want to try again :) Any kind of help is appreaciated.

item.title: Help getting server online
item.dc:creator: @kakur007 kakur007
item.description:
@kakur007 wrote:

I was away from rsc scene and have not really touched MoparClassic source, I will check it out.

Where can I download moparclassic source?

Read full topic

item.title: Help getting server online
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

If you want to use a database, but don’t want to mess with anything web-related, you might want to try MoparClassic.

You can use the MySQL storage medium along with the PersistenceAuth authentication scheme to get the desired effect.

To do that, you’d change the following lines (in the LS config):

<entry key="storage-medium">org.moparscape.msc.ls.persistence.impl.SerializedStorageMedium</entry> <entry key="auth-class">org.moparscape.msc.ls.auth.impl.DummyAuth</entry>

to this:

<entry key="storage-medium">org.moparscape.msc.ls.persistence.impl.MySQL</entry> <entry key="auth-class">org.moparscape.msc.ls.auth.impl.PersistenceAuth</entry>

Read full topic

item.title: Help getting server online
item.dc:creator: @kakur007 kakur007
item.description:
@kakur007 wrote:

i got no idea, when i ran into that problem, i looked, couldnt see anything wrong. It was 2 years ago… I tried to look again but no luck still. Everything seems to work like it should work but in the other hand nothing works, cause its just black screen…No idea. No errors, thats why its kinda hard to locate the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Help getting server online
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

kakur007:

Its not what you are thinking I dont have problem “getting server online”, thing is, it just aint working. Everything runs, db connecting is established. But when I try to log in, its just black screen for about 10 secs and it throws back to login screen but account still logged in. I cant figure it out thats why Im just asking a bit help from someone who is into this and maybe can take a look through teamview.

Sounds like a corrupted packet or something

Read full topic
